content: Good evening everyone, here in my place the time is 22:33 pm. I want to share about the position I am in right now. I live in an iland called MINAMA, over here there is no electricity, major road, or boreholes we all use the water from the river and it's affecting us, but that's not my problem, Â my problem is I'm not always online on this forum because there is no light and no were to charge my cellphone so I always manage my battery. The only place am charging my phone is my neighbor's place, now am tired of going there to charge my cellphone, so what will I do so I can be more available on this forum? I managed to post this thread because I traveled, we normally use canoe ðŸ›¶ to go to the market or travelingEver since I join this forum I have learned a lot about bitcoin and how people become rich through bitcoin investment, I am very much interested in bitcoin investment and I am willing to invest no matter the risk.

comments.author: AverageGlabella
comments.body: Earn some money and invest in your own solar panels so you can charge your devices? How are you connecting to the internet when you do not have electricity is it by satellite? I think buying your own solar panels and have them top up a battery during the day and them charge your devices over night should help with your problems. Browsing and posting on the forum does not use much battery and you should be able to get multiple days out of 1 charge if you do not use it for any thing else.

comments.author: Zorigi
comments.body: You have to be patient, friend, hopefully in the future you will get good facilities related to electricity.looks like you have to buy solar panels, or you can also search the internet about how to make electricity.

comments.author: mk4
comments.body: Why do you necessarily need to be online on Bitcointalk all the time though? If you want to learn, you could also save some articles offline so you could read them even without internet connection.* If you like reading articles: https://coindesk.com/learn* If you like reading books: https://theinternetofmoney.info/* If you like watching videos: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLPQwGV1aLnTuN6kdNWlElfr2tzigB9NnjSecurity related:* https://cryptosec.info* https://www.lopp.net/bitcoin-information/security.htmlIf you want to get more technical* https://github.com/bitcoinbook/bitcoinbook#chapters

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: It is nice you have such passion for learning and knowing more about bitcoin but the challenges you have mentioned is nothing to be bothered about. It does no necessarily mean that you must be online everyday to follow up or to learn about bitcoin. You can still learn offline if you do not mind. If you can, go get a power bank for yourself so you could charge it when you go out so it can serve as a backup for you or if you have the money for solar just as the poster above have said, you can install it then use it to power your phone but however, you can still learn about bitcoin offline by downloading of articles, manuals etc so you can learn by reading them. You are free to download from the links as presented to you by the otherÂ  poster.

comments.author: Despairo
comments.body: Quote from: rachael9385 on February 28, 2023, 09:31:09 PMI am very much interested in bitcoin investment and I am willing to invest no the risk. Any investment, not only limited to Bitcoin, has carry some risk even it's very low. Bitcoin is considered as a high risk investment because no one can control it, available to trade for 24/7, etc the good thing is, there's no manipulation. So if you think Bitcoin has no risk and you will always make profit everyday, you're wrong, it's what's ponzi scheme offer where they promise fake 1% return per day.You only need to learn about the difference between Bitcoin and fiat with bank, non custodial wallet and how to use an exchange to start your journey.

comments.author: joniboini
comments.body: Can't you copy what your neighbor did for your electricity problem? If the reason why you can't do that is a lack of money, then there is no other option other than to look for jobs and save some money so that you can have access to electricity on your own. It is surprising that there is still a place not covered by electricity, considering that you have access to a phone.As for your investment question, a lack of internet access is not really what you should focus on right now. Try to search and research if trading Bitcoin is allowed in your area, if there is any P2P market, and so on. This will help you can decide how you will buy your first coins. Don't try to hurry and buy from some random guy on the internet just because they offer cheap prices, there are tons of scammers online. No need to rush, especially if you don't have the means to do so.

comments.author: xSkylarx
comments.body: Your will is really driving you to learn more. It must be difficult for you, but I am shocked that you've found bitcoin and are starting to learn from it, even if you are in a remote area. What I've suggested to you is that you download a pdf about Bitcoin by searching on Google, as it can save you more battery than always opening your internet. Try to read it. Though I know you want to access the forum to learn, it is difficult in your situation. You can just browse the forum when you have internet access, so make it count. read as much of the thread.

comments.author: kro55
comments.body: Quote from: joniboini on March 01, 2023, 03:07:43 AM It is surprising that there is still a place not covered by electricity, considering that you have access to a phone.In my country, there are many areas that still do not have electricity. The area where my grandmother lives is also in a remote location, and there isn't yet any electricity. Every time I visit my grandmother, I have a lot of trouble without electricity, but everyone's solution is to use an electric battery. If we rarely use it and only use it to charge the phone and use it for emergencies, it can be used for 5 days before bringing it to the market to charge. If solar panels are expensive, OP can also think of a electric battery solution.

comments.author: Strongkored
comments.body: Quote from: rachael9385 on February 28, 2023, 09:31:09 PMEver since I join this forum I have learned a lot about bitcoin and how people become rich through bitcoin investment, I am very much interested in bitcoin investment and I am willing to invest no the risk. What exactly do you want to get? Want to know more about Bitcoin? or how to get rich quickly from Bitcoin? If the main target is to learn a lot about Bitcoin then the suggestions above are enough to answer your question and have provided a solution for those of you who are having difficulties with electricity and an internet connection, but if the purpose of knowing about Bitcoin is because you want to get rich quickly then you already got the wrong information and hopefully you don't get the information from the closest people who have also been involved in this forum because it's misleading information especially if you don't want to take risk it then it's impossible.
